jobsJson.descriptionPlain:
You will be given specific set of problems to solve, that will have impact to million of lives, change economy landscape, and have some fun while doing it!

● Define opportunities to increase Drivers Earnings --> what problems are you trying to solve?
● Analyze potential benefit for Drivers, GOJEK, and all related stakeholders --> how will this benefit all related stakeholders?
● Design the optimum solution, together with Product and Tech team --> how your solution can solve the problem?
● Develop MVP and conduct Pilot as POC --> will it work?
● Roll out to all Drivers --> how to scale?
● Monitor the implementation and result --> lesson learned?
jobsJson.description:
You will be given specific set of problems to solve, that will have impact to million of lives, change economy landscape, and have some fun while doing it!

● Define opportunities to increase Drivers Earnings --> what problems are you trying to solve?
● Analyze potential benefit for Drivers, GOJEK, and all related stakeholders --> how will this benefit all related stakeholders?
● Design the optimum solution, together with Product and Tech team --> how your solution can solve the problem?
● Develop MVP and conduct Pilot as POC --> will it work?
● Roll out to all Drivers --> how to scale?
● Monitor the implementation and result --> lesson learned?
jobsJson.additionalPlain:
Gojek is a technology startup based in Jakarta, Indonesia. Specialising in ride-hailing and logistics, we are also the only company in Southeast Asia to be part of Fortune's 50 Companies That Changed the World (2017).

Gojek is a Super App: one app with over 20 services including food delivery, commuting, digital payments, shopping, hyper-local delivery, massages, and many more.

Gojek is Indonesia’s first and fastest growing unicorn building an on-demand empire. Our total of 2,000,000 driver-partners collectively travel 16.5 million KM daily – making us Indonesia’s de-facto transportation choice.

Gojek is a verb! Gojek is a way of life!

lists.content:
• Min 5 years experience of project improvement
  • Preferable from Management Consulting or Tech-company
  • Top notch problem solving skill
  • Structured and concise communication
  • Hustler. Able to execute, not just a think tank
  • Manage several projects at a time
  • Passionate about using technology to improve people's life
  • Humble and ready to create social impact with us!
